overview: Should you hide behind the sofa? Or should you be brave and confront the 'horrors' of this fabulous Scream parody face-to-face? Whatever you decide, make sure your zipper’s down and your cock’s well-lubed, as a collection of gorgeous jizz-hungry dudes ride raw and wild for your pleasure. Not for the faint-hearted — but definitely for the horny! Twinks that are scared and fucked bare! They'll do anything the big dicked Boogie Man says. Even take his big dick in their ass!
title: Bare Scare
